name: Food Crisis
description:
In early development, using an original story set in a post-apocalyptic world of isolation, disease, and decay. A choose your own adventure story using text-based commands.

We have a discord where you can give feedback, suggestions, report bugs, and see updates. https://discord.gg/yqzZTrr

Credits:
Programmer: Mica Raymond
Writer: Mica Raymond
Artist: Robert Wolf
Music: Isolated'Kevin MacLeod(incompetech.com)Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
